channel.title: I need to no how to change def requierments and attack?
channel.description:
All my barrows and dragon i can wield at lvl 1 attack and defence
how do i change the lvl requierments?
Help Please kilopy:):):):):)

item.title: I need to no how to change def requierments and attack?
item.dc:creator: @happy2help happy2help
item.description:
@happy2help wrote:

Click Here:

you go to item.cfg or sumthing called that, search the code of the armour and change the lvl.

LOL ure funnyâ€¦ ure completely wrong

what you do is in client.java search for:

/*Equipment level checking*/

under that you will see:

	public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

under that you put:

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dharoks greataxe")) { return 135; }

that would make it so you need 135 attack for dharoks greataxe, then somewhere below that you do the same for strength, defence, range and mage

Read full topic
item.source: I need to no how to change def requierments and attack?
